resources.string: Our mission is to carter to the needs of ever man, woman, boy or girl who loves to cook and loves to eat home cooked meals. \nWe hope to encourage everyone who loves to cook, who wishes to learn to cook and who already loves to cook to keep cooking.

Our vision is to have our meal boxes in every home in Nigeria. To encourage people to stay healthy and enjoy life by offering an affordable solution to learning how to cook and preparing meals at home.
